mapper.select: select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on u.id=a.owner where a.name like '%' #{name} '%'

select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate from tbl_contacts_activity_relation car join tbl_activity a on a.id=car.activityId join tbl_user u on u.id=a.owner where car.contactsId=#{contactsId}
select count(*) as value, u.name as name from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on u.id=a.owner group by owner

select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on u.id=a.owner where a.name like '%' #{name} '%' and a.id not in( select activityId from tbl_contacts_activity_relation where contactsId=#{contactsId} )

select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on u.id=a.owner where a.name like '%' #{name} '%' and a.id not in( select activityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId=#{clueId} )

select car.id as id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate from tbl_clue_activity_relation car join tbl_activity a on a.id=car.activityId join tbl_user u on u.id=a.owner where car.clueId=#{clueId}

select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.editTime, a.editBy from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id where a.id=#{id}
